title: Ticket #1444: condor_install may silently ignore invalid --types?
description:
admin 20656 included the following command: 

sudo ./condor_install --install-dir=/bin --local-dir=/etc --type=manager,submit,excute

The following output did not complain that "excute" is an invalid type. (Ignore that installing into /bin and /etc is a bad idea.)

1. Check if condor_install/condor_configure warns about invalid entries in the --type option. 2. If it does, teach it to warn about them.
